Title: Just Like Joe
Writer: Fred Carpenter (story and screenplay), Jerry Delamater (story), Paul Regina (screenplay), Thom Sciacca (story), Joanne Tamburro (screenplay)
Actors: Paul Vario, Matthew Pappadia, Anthony Trentacosta, Clifford Lee
Plot: "JUST LIKE JOE" is a poignant coming-of-age story that will touch your heart and bring you back to an era when Woodstock became legend and the Peace, Love and Rock 'N Roll generation was ...
